title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When a .java file is open in the editor and the new class wizard button is clicked, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor
SR:
1. Open a .java file in the editor
2. Click the new class wizard button
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the wizard
